## Remarks Use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> class to specify how a username and password is validated. This can be done by deriving a class from <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator> and override the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.UserNamePasswordValidator.Validate%2A> method. For more information about creating a custom user name and password validator, see [How to: Use a Custom User Name and Password Validator](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/how-to-use-a-custom-user-name-and-password-validator.md).
